item.title: By: Foton of AFKGamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFKGamer
item.description:
Warriors really got the (ahem) shaft. One of my hunting partners played a warrior in Closed Beta and, even to this day, will not shut up about the once powerful warriors.
Stick around long enough, everyone eats some nerf.

item.title: By: Abalieno
item.dc:creator: Abalieno
item.description:
At the beginning I was confident about Blizzard's behaviour with the work on the classes. I'm one of those who do not really care about balance issues and do not contribute to long to infinite threads, exactly because it's something that keeps changing continuously. I think it's a good thing and I'm worried when this stops, when noone tries new solutions anymore.
Till the point that made me write this: http://www.cesspit.net/drupal/node/284
From my point of view the most powerful class (and same in many other games) is the priest. For the simple reason that they are always required, they can make the difference.
I just hope that Blizzard doesn't continue to remove the abilities that made their classes beautiful and unique. Like in the case of the warrior I tried to explain.
